description: Harlequins centre Joe Marchant signs a new and extended contract with the Premiership club.
title: Harlequins: Joe Marchant signs new and extended contract with club
title_page: Harlequins: Joe Marchant signs new and extended contract with club - BBC Sport
maintext:
Harlequins centre Joe Marchant has signed a new and extended contract with the Premiership club.
Marchant, 20, has made 37 appearances for Quins since making his senior debut in May 2015, scoring 11 tries.
"I'm delighted to have re-signed with Harlequins," he said., external "This is such a great club and I have loved my time here. It was an easy decision to stay."
Marchant had been due to tour Argentina with England last month but was ruled out with a toe injury.
